definition: to come unsewn/to split at the seam

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.chinese: 洗几次后，衣服变形，掉色，边缘开线。

sentences.english: The optimum design method of involute internal gear slotting cutter is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了渐开线直齿内齿轮插齿刀的优化设计方法。

sentences.english: This kind of carpet will never ravel.
sentences.chinese: 这种地毯永远不会开线。

The shape of the tooth is an involute helicoid .

sentences.english: His pants were too tight; when he was climbing the mountain, they burst at the seams.
sentences.chinese: 他的裤子穿得太紧了，登山的时间开线了。
